title: How To Smart Home + Asimov's Sci-Fi (gnv64)
description:
How To Smart Home: A Step by Step Guide to Your Personal Internet of Things (3rd Ed)
by Othmar Kyas
Key Concept Press | ISBN 978-3-944980-06-5 | March 2015 | ePUB/MOBI | 12.6 mb <a href="
http://www.howtosmarthome.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.howtosmarthome.com</a>

The book explains the key concepts of smart homes and provides a step by step instruction to build an Internet of Things for personal usage. It covers all major technologies and vendors: from Apple HomeKit to Z-Wave, from Google Nest to Bluetooth LE, from OpenRemote to ZigBee. It walks the reader through an actual implementation of a smart home system using state of the art technologies such as tablets, smartphones, a rule engine and the Internet in conjunction with the latest wireline and wireless home automation standards.
